Course Updated 5th September With New Added Video

This course will teach you how to understand market rhythms and how to integrate them into your trading. Market rhythm is applicable whatever time frame, trading instrument or trading system you use and will help you both increase profits and just as important, reduce losses!

This course was created because there is very little usable information available on market rhythms and how they affect your trading and yet it is a vital part of any trading decision that you make. Market rhythms apply to the movement of the market, candle patterns and chart patterns. Price action does not form in a vacuum; there are transitions from one type of price action to another. The market tends to form rhythmic price action which then transitions through to non-rhythmic price action. By understanding what the market is telling you, you can make better trading decisions.

The course is presented in a nice and simple to understand fashion and the creator is on hand to answer any student questions. The course is dynamic and will be added to over time.

To get an idea of the potential value of this new course, here are some comments on my other books and courses from my readers and students.
